content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Overview\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This document is a brief overview of the EPAM Global Travel and Expense Policy (“Policy”), located on\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Global+Travel\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Business Travel space\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". All employees seeking expense reimbursement while traveling for EPAM business are responsible for understanding the Policy before incurring expenses. The Global Travel and Expense Management groups provides EPAM employees, contractors and other third parties with logistical and financial support to further the mission of EPAM Systems and all of its subsidiaries. All local laws, regulations, and travel policies will supersede the Policy, when any conflicts exist.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel Arrangements & Authorization\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All business travel must be arranged via “approved travel booking channels” to best leverage negotiated rates with providers, as well as, ensure compliance with local travel policies, regulations, laws and guidelines.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Approved Travel Booking Channels are the mandatory methods of booking travel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Via the traveler's country-specific, Corporate Online Booking Tool (hereafter “OBT”)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Via the traveler's country-specific, Travel Management Company (hereafter “TMC”)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Via the traveler's country-specific, WFA Travel DL (hereafter “Travel Desk”)\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees are required to submit a Concur Request, to the respective approver, prior to making business travel arrangements. Approved Travel Booking Channels will not finalize travel arrangements until the Concur Request has been approved. This provides visibility into business travel budgeting, volume, data and other metrics.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Self-booking outside of Approved Travel Booking Methods is strictly prohibited, even when lower-cost alternatives exist.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Air Travel\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bookings will be issued in Coach/Economy class only.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-billable travel must be requested in Concur Request at least 10 days in advance, and booked at least 7 days in advance, via approved travel booking channels, when possible.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"International flights exceeding 8 hours of flying time are eligible for Premium Economy Seating when booked via Approved Travel Booking Channels, at least 7 days in advance.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM encourages the use of low-cost carriers when possible. Upgrades (such as extra-leg room, bigger carry-on bag, and checked-in luggage) while using the low-cost carriers are permitted.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Approved Travel Booking Channel Fees have been negotiated and are reimbursable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ground Transportation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Public Transportation, Uber, and Taxis are the preferred methods of ground transportation during Business Trips.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Car Rentals:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Economy, Compact, and Intermediate are the approved car rental sizes\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Preferred Vendors: Avis, National, Enterprise & Budget (in US & CA only) - Decline all insurances if traveling on EPAM business\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All other Car Rental vendors: Accept all appropriate insurances, excluding personal insurance coverage\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Additional authorized drivers must be included at the time of pickup on the car rental agreement, if the additional driver is also an EPAM employee\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"An EPAM Employee is not insured, if they violate the material terms of the rental car agreement including abusing the vehicle, driving the vehicle recklessly, driving without a valid license, and/or operating the vehicle while under the influence of alcohol or drugs\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal Vehicle Usage for Business: Mileage and kilometers driven for business purpose (collectively referred to as “mileage”) will be reimbursed at the local government-issued business mileage rate for miles (or km) incurred in excess of the employee's normal commuting mileage. It is the responsibility of the owner of a vehicle, being used for business, to carry adequate insurance coverage for his or her own protection and that of their passengers as well as other vehicles/property impacted.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Lodging\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Corporate apartments can be utilized when and where available, and when proximity to their place of business, is a reasonable commute.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hotel lodging must be reserved in a business standard, single-occupancy room at a Preferred Hotel unless none is available for the requested time, or the location is insufficient for business purposes.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Non-refundable, pre-paid hotel reservations are not allowed. Unused, non-refundable reservations become the employee's responsibility and EPAM will not absorb these costs.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Maximum nightly lodging rate guidelines by city are located on the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Daily+Maximums+for+Lodging\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Company will not reimburse for no-show charges, unless the traveler can provide a sufficient reason why the cancellation was outside of their control. Cancellations must take place at least 24 hours in advance, and are based on the local time of the hotel and do vary by property.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM encourage the use of hotels that offer breakfast included in the rate and no additional cost. If the hotel chosen does not include free breakfast, travelers from per diem countries will be required to use their per diem to cover breakfast.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Meals\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If traveler is based in a per diem country, please refer to the local travel policy for daily per diem rates and accounting rules. Per Diem is intended to cover all meals and local transportation, where applicable.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If traveler is based in a non-per diem country, maximum daily meal allowance is capped based on destination and a breakdown is available on\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=505051121\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Only actual documented meal expenses, with proper and original receipts including taxes and gratuities will be reimbursed. Employees are expected to use good judgment in choosing restaurants that are reasonable in cost.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Under no circumstances can the traveler claim both per diem and reimbursement for actual expenses, on the same trip.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel Documentation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business travelers are provided with Risk Management and Business Travel Accident Insurance via Healix. Please consult the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Travel+Risk+Management+Program\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" for additional services, support, and general safety tips.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is the employee's responsibility to ensure they are compliant with their destination countries specific requirements, with regards to, how long the traveler is in the destination country, as authorized by the type of visa the traveler is holding for their business trips.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Further Information on how to obtain visas, insurances, invitation, and support letters are available on the OBT's home page under Company Notes. This information can also be found on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Invitation+letter+signatory\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees may NEVER obtain a tourist visa to travel on Company business, but rather must obtain the correct business visa (or short-term visa or equivalent), or work authorization as required, prior to the scheduled departure date.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Travel document costs (visas & other entry costs) are reimbursable if required for business travel purposes. Passports are not considered reimbursable travel documents.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Allowable Business Travel Expenses\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Laundry or dry-cleaning for trips in excess of 5 days, up to maximum allowance of $50/week\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Parking & Tolls\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Gasoline for rental vehicles\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Business phone calls\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ground & Public transportation\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Currency Conversion costs\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Personal car mileage, in excess of traveler's normal commute\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Conference or Seminar fees\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Taxis\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Visa fees\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mandatory or Highly-Recommended Immunization fees\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internet when not included in hotel room rate\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Exceptions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"While the Policy and supporting documents in KB are comprehensive, it is impossible to anticipate every situation encountered, the spirit and intent of the Policy must be applied to circumstances not specifically addressed. When a specific policy is not stated, adhere to the basic use of prudence in the use of company resources and exercise good business judgment.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There may be unique and valid business needs, which require exceptions to this policy. Exceptions must be a valid business need, and not simply a traveler preference, and must be requested prior to incurring the expense. Exceptions must be properly documented on the expense report with pre-approvals attached.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Detailed information regarding The Global Travel & Expense Policy is located on the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMTRVBT/Global+Travel\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and the Online Booking Tools under Company Notes\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
